motd: Bugfix: Upgrading to Banshee's Veil while the passive is on cooldown now properly transfers the timer.

passive_1: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next hostile ability (60 second cooldown, restarts upon taking damage from champions).
Killing a unit grants 0.3 bonus magic resistance, up to a maximum of 9.
Killing a unit grants 0.5 bonus magic resistance, up to a maximum of 15.
Every 60 seconds gain 3 bonus magic resistance, stacking up to 5 times. Taking magic damage from champions reduces the time it takes to gain magic resistance equal to 5% of damage taken in seconds.
